title: MoMa Complexity and Contradiction - Sans Serif - FONT ID
content:
Looking for an ID on the lovely sans serif used on this book cover.

Many thanks in advance for any help!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829011755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Complexity_6532.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Complexity.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829011755/http:/typophile.com/files/Complexity.jpg) | 724.45 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
You can try **[Gothic 725 (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829011755/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Gothic725%20Bd%20BT%20-%20Bold&fid=1de15edd22e1f96768be1fab0fc35869&fsize=60&text=Complexity%20and%20Contradiction%20in%20Architecture&wrap=2)** from Bitstream (better match on letter width, but /t is bit off)  
or **[Akzidenz Grotesk (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829011755/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=AkzidenzGrotesk%20-%20Bold&fid=10d3028d298b83a4c305735808f12c8d&fsize=60&text=Complexity%20and%20Contradiction%20in%20Architecture&wrap=2)** by Berthold (the /t matches better but you should make it more condensed to match your sample)
